title: 'Our once-in-a-lifetime trip is ruined' - England fans in Japan left with 'no information' after arrival of Typhoon Hagibis
text:
The arrival of Typhoon Hagibis has wreaked havoc with the 2019 Rugby World Cup schedule and ruined the holidays of thousands of fans who travelled to Japan to support their team in the biggest competition in world rugby.

Both England vs France and New Zealand vs Italy have been cancelled as a consequence of the 160mph winds that are expected to hit the wider Tokyo area this weekend. Now other fixtures, including Sunday’s Pool A decider between Japan and Scotland, could be abandoned.

This will undoubtedly have severe repercussions for a number of teams who are hoping to progress past the group stage of the tournament, most notably Scotland who could be eliminated if they are unable to play Japan...
description: The arrival of Typhoon Hagibis has wreaked havoc with the 2019 Rugby World Cup schedule and ruined the holidays of thousands of fans who travelled to Japan to support their team in the biggest competition in world rugby.
